Scan - Class in game
Scans a map and returns targets Uses code written by Spike to find targets

shoot(Actor, GameMap, Location) - Method in class game.RangedWeapon
 
shoot(Actor, GameMap, Location) - Method in class game.Shotgun
This method will shoot the target with a probability of 75% Other targets in the vicinity and in a 90 degree area will also have a probability of being shot
shoot(Actor, GameMap, Location) - Method in class game.Sniper
This method will shoot the target with a probability of 75% if the player has not aimed at all The more the player aims the more damage and more accurate the shot will be If the player aims for 2 rounds then the target is killed instantly
